unit.data.plague_doctor.name: Plague Doctor
unit.data.plague_doctor.lore: Medical practitioners that study the art of diseases, poison and decay. They are often seen roaming Temples and hospices collecting samples from dead or diseased bodies.
unit.data.plague_doctor.description.visu: Human wearing a grey and green outfit, fully covering his face and body using leather clothing and a mask with a long beak. His leather belt is carrying multiple flasks filled with a green bubbly liquid.
